name: Web_Survivor
description:
Submission for the Roguelike Jam 2.

An arena survivor roguelike where you fight computer viruses using different softwares that you can unlock and updrade. A run is 10 minutes long, with a bigger fight at the end.

Controls:

Just your mouse cursor and the left click!

Escape for the option menu.

Another version will be uploaded in the following days with more content, upgraded graphics, and bug fixes.
